configuration.label: ThreatQ URL
configuration.description: This is the URL to the ThreatQ instance.

configuration.label: ThreatQ Client ID
configuration.description: This is the ThreatQ Oauth2 Client ID.

configuration.label: ThreatQ Client Secret
configuration.description: This is the ThreatQ Oauth2 Client Secret.

configuration.label: ThreatQ Search Names
configuration.description: This is the ThreatQ search names that contain the data to be imported. This should be a comma separated list of search names, or a single search name.
